message.content:
1. Telmisartan is an antihypertensive agent.
2. Telmisartan has evidence of partial peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor activity-gamma (PPARγ) activity.
3. Telmisartan may improve insulin sensitivity in patients with metabolic syndrome.
4. Telmisartan may improve the lipid profile in patients with metabolic syndrome.

messages.content:
Statement: Telmisartan, an antihypertensive agent with evidence of partial peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor activity-gamma (PPARγ) activity, may improve insulin sensitivity and lipid profile in patients with metabolic syndrome.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
